page.title: 08THE LOCAL ESTATE AGENTS
page.content: On the 25th of June Mr Wiscom came into our school to talk to us about his job.We asked him some questions and he kindly answered them for us. He told us that he was his own boss and that his{business}is expanding. He is taking on a full time seller and a secretary.Mr Wiscom shares a property in Bridgwater and a home and business in Jersey.The premises has been used for a variety of purposes in the past including a "fencing and sword shop". Mr Wiscom also is an agent for the {Alliance building}Society.The cheapest house he has ever sold is Â£15,000,and the dearest is Â£180,000.Mr Wiscom enjoys his job and at the moment has an assistant called Mr Lovett. " I think being an{estate agent}would be a very interesting job because you dont have to sit around all day."
